mapper.select: -- AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT STWD_LNM FROM WAM_STWD WHERE UPPER(STWD_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') OR UPPER(STWD_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTerm}, '%') ORDER BY STWD_LNM limit ${maxRows}

-- AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT DMN_LNM FROM WAM_DMN WHERE UPPER(DMN_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') OR UPPER(DMN_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') ORDER BY DMN_LNM limit ${maxRows}

-- AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT SDITM_LNM FROM WAM_SDITM WHERE UPPER(SDITM_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') OR UPPER(SDITM_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') ORDER BY SDITM_LNM limit ${maxRows}

-- AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT SYMN_LNM FROM WAM_SYMN WHERE UPPER(SYMN_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') OR UPPER(SYMN_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') ORDER BY SYMN_LNM limit ${maxRows}

-- AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT SBSWD_LNM FROM WAM_SYMN WHERE UPPER(SBSWD_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') OR UPPER(SBSWD_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') ORDER BY SBSWD_LNM limit ${maxRows}

-- AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT SUBJ_LNM FROM WAA_SUBJ WHERE (UPPER(SUBJ_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') OR UPPER(SUBJ_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%')) AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY SUBJ_LNM limit ${maxRows}

-- AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT PDM_TBL_LNM FROM WAM_PDM_TBL WHERE UPPER(PDM_TBL_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') OR UPPER(PDM_TBL_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') GROUP BY PDM_TBL_LNM ORDER BY PDM_TBL_LNM limit ${maxRows}

-- AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT PDM_COL_LNM FROM WAM_PDM_COL WHERE UPPER(PDM_COL_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') OR UPPER(PDM_COL_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') GROUP BY PDM_COL_LNM ORDER BY PDM_COL_LNM limit ${maxRows}

-- AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT DDL_TBL_LNM FROM WAM_DDL_TBL WHERE UPPER(DDL_TBL_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') OR UPPER(DDL_TBL_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') GROUP BY DDL_TBL_LNM UNION ALL SELECT DDL_TBL_PNM AS DDL_TBL_LNM FROM WAM_DDL_TBL WHERE UPPER(DDL_TBL_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') OR UPPER(DDL_TBL_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') GROUP BY DDL_TBL_PNM ORDER BY DDL_TBL_LNM limit ${maxRows}

-- AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT DBC_TBL_NM FROM WAT_DBC_TBL WHERE UPPER(DBC_TBL_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') GROUP BY DBC_TBL_NM UNION ALL SELECT DBC_TBL_KOR_NM AS DBC_TBL_NM FROM WAT_DBC_TBL WHERE UPPER(DBC_TBL_KOR_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') GROUP BY DBC_TBL_KOR_NM ORDER BY DBC_TBL_NM limit ${maxRows}

-- AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT BIZ_AREA_LNM FROM WAM_BIZ_AREA WHERE UPPER(BIZ_AREA_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') UNION ALL SELECT BIZ_AREA_PNM AS BIZ_AREA_LNM FROM WAM_BIZ_AREA WHERE UPPER(BIZ_AREA_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') ORDER BY BIZ_AREA_LNM limit ${maxRows}

-- AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT DQI_LNM FROM WAM_DQI WHERE UPPER(DQI_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') UNION ALL SELECT DQI_PNM AS DQI_LNM FROM WAM_DQI WHERE UPPER(DQI_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') ORDER BY DQI_LNM limit ${maxRows}

-- AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT CTQ_LNM FROM WAM_CTQ WHERE UPPER(CTQ_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') UNION ALL SELECT CTQ_PNM AS CTQ_LNM FROM WAM_CTQ WHERE UPPER(CTQ_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') ORDER BY CTQ_LNM limit ${maxRows}

-- AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT DB_SCH_LNM FROM WAA_DB_SCH WHERE UPPER(DB_SCH_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') UNION ALL SELECT DB_SCH_PNM AS DB_SCH_LNM FROM WAA_DB_SCH WHERE UPPER(DB_SCH_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') ORDER BY DB_SCH_LNM limit ${maxRows}

-- AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT DBC_COL_NM FROM WAT_DBC_COL WHERE UPPER(DBC_COL_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') GROUP BY DBC_COL_NM UNION ALL SELECT DBC_COL_KOR_NM AS DBC_COL_NM FROM WAT_DBC_COL WHERE UPPER(DBC_COL_KOR_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') GROUP BY DBC_COL_KOR_NM ORDER BY DBC_COL_NM limit ${maxRows}
-- AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT BR_NM FROM WAM_BR_MSTR WHERE UPPER(BR_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') ORDER BY BR_NM limit ${maxRows}

-- AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT SHD_LNM FROM WAM_SHD_MSTR WHERE UPPER(SHD_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') UNION ALL SELECT SHD_PNM AS SHD_LNM FROM WAM_SHD_MSTR WHERE UPPER(SHD_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') ORDER BY SHD_LNM limit ${maxRows}

-- AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT USER_NM FROM WAA_USER WHERE UPPER(USER_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY USER_NM limit ${maxRows}

-- AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... -- 작업명 SELECT BR_NM AS OBJ_NM FROM WAM_BR_MSTR WHERE UPPER(BR_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT('[스키마수집]',DB_CONN_TRG_PNM) AS OBJ_NM FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG WHERE UPPER(DB_CONN_TRG_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') OR '[스키마수집]' LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT('[',C.COMM_DTL_CD_NM,']',A.DBC_TBL_NM,'.',A.OBJ_NM) AS OBJ_NM FROM WAM_PRF_MSTR A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_COMM_DTL_CD C ON C.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND A.PRF_KND_CD = C.COMM_DTL_CD AND COMM_DCD_ID = 'OBJ_00000000342' WHERE A.PRF_KND_CD LIKE CONCAT('%','PC','%') AND UPPER(C.COMM_DTL_CD_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') OR UPPER(A.DBC_TBL_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') OR UPPER(A.OBJ_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT('[',C.COMM_DTL_CD_NM,']',A.OBJ_NM) AS OBJ_NM FROM WAM_PRF_MSTR A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_COMM_DTL_CD C ON C.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND A.PRF_KND_CD = C.COMM_DTL_CD AND COMM_DCD_ID = 'OBJ_00000000342' WHERE A.PRF_KND_CD LIKE CONCAT('%','PT','%') AND UPPER(C.COMM_DTL_CD_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') OR UPPER(A.OBJ_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') UNION ALL SELECT ETC_JOB_NM FROM WAM_SHD_JOB WHERE UPPER(ETC_JOB_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') ORDER BY OBJ_NM limit ${maxRows} -- 출력결과는 오라클과 같으나 쿼리 결과가 매우 늦게 나옴

-- AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT DB_CONN_TRG_LNM FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG WHERE UPPER(DB_CONN_TRG_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') UNION ALL SELECT DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS DB_CONN_TRG_LNM FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG WHERE UPPER(DB_CONN_TRG_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') ORDER BY DB_CONN_TRG_LNM limit ${maxRows}

-- AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT DEPT_NM FROM WAA_DEPT WHERE UPPER(DEPT_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') ORDER BY DEPT_NM limit ${maxRows}

-- AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT DMNG_LNM FROM WAA_DMNG WHERE UPPER(DMNG_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') UNION ALL SELECT DMNG_PNM AS DMNG_LNM FROM WAA_DMNG WHERE UPPER(DMNG_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') ORDER BY DMNG_LNM limit ${maxRows}

-- AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT MENU_NM FROM WAA_PRGM_MENU WHERE UPPER(MENU_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') ORDER BY MENU_NM limit ${maxRows}

-- AutoComplete 단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT DDL_TBL_LNM FROM WAM_DDL_TSF_TBL WHERE UPPER(DDL_TBL_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') OR UPPER(DDL_TBL_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') GROUP BY DDL_TBL_LNM UNION ALL SELECT DDL_TBL_PNM AS DDL_TBL_LNM FROM WAM_DDL_TSF_TBL WHERE UPPER(DDL_TBL_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') OR UPPER(DDL_TBL_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') GROUP BY DDL_TBL_PNM ORDER BY DDL_TBL_LNM limit ${maxRows}

-- AutoComplete 매립지공사 기술용어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT SLC_GLOSSARY_NM FROM SLC_GLOSSARY_M WHERE UPPER(SLC_GLOSSARY_NM ) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') OR UPPER(SLC_GLOSSARY_ENG_NM ) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') GROUP BY SLC_GLOSSARY_NM UNION ALL SELECT SLC_GLOSSARY_ENG_NM AS DDL_TBL_LNM FROM SLC_GLOSSARY_M WHERE UPPER(SLC_GLOSSARY_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') OR UPPER(SLC_GLOSSARY_ENG_NM ) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') GROUP BY SLC_GLOSSARY_ENG_NM -- ORDER BY SLC_GLOSSARY_NM limit ${maxRows}

-- AutoComplete APP단어 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT APP_STWD_LNM FROM WAM_APP_STWD WHERE UPPER(APP_STWD_LNM ) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') OR UPPER(APP_STWD_PNM ) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') GROUP BY APP_STWD_LNM limit ${maxRows}

-- AutoComplete APP항목 리스트 조회 10개만 가져온다.... SELECT APP_SDITM_LNM FROM WAM_APP_SDITM WHERE UPPER(APP_SDITM_LNM ) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') OR UPPER(APP_SDITM_PNM ) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%') GROUP BY APP_SDITM_LNM limit ${maxRows}
